import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import getCompanyInfo from '../../services/getCompanyInfo'; import { Section, Container, Article, Title,Text,Grid,Item } from './styles'; const About = () => { const [info, setinfo] = useState({}) useEffect(()=>{ getCompanyInfo() // .then(info=>setinfo({...info})) },[]) return (
{/* about: {info.name} */} {/* {info.summary} */}

company info

*/}

More

{/*

about: me Hi, I'm Camilo Velandia, a passionate self-taught frontEnd web developer from Colombia. with an interest in web and mobile projects, with user-centered approaches. currently part of the Platzi master program.

experience

  • Software Developer at Platzi master
  • Frontend Developer at 360 PMI
  • Find me in Linkedin{" "}
  • Find me in Twitter

tools

  • React js

  • Next js
  • Styled components
  • Git
); }; export default About;
